mapper.select: SELECT p.*, ph.serPhotoname FROM profile p LEFT JOIN photo ph ON p.profileID = ph.photoidenNum WHERE p.userID = #{param1} AND ph.categoryCode = #{param2} AND ph.photoidenNum = #{param3} AND ph.photoBlindWhether = 0
